fields.label: Forward Proxy Verify Cert Fail Action

cm-meta.help: Action taken if certificate verification fails, close the connection by default

allowed.label: Block
allowed.help: block the connection with a warning page

cm-meta.help: Action taken if a certificate is irreversibly revoked, bypass SSLi processing by default

allowed.label: Block
allowed.help: block the connection with a warning page

fields.label: Forward Proxy No Shared Cipher Action

cm-meta.help: Action taken if handshake fails due to no shared ciper, close the connection by default
Action taken if a certificate revocation status is unknown, bypass SSLi processing by default

allowed.label: Block
allowed.help: block the connection with a warning page

cm-meta.help: Message to be included on the block page
SSL forward proxy action in No SNI case

fields.label: Forward Proxy Cert Not Ready Action

cm-meta.help: Action taken if certificate cache is not ready, bypass connections by default

allowed.label: Intercept
allowed.help: wait for cert and then inspect the connection
